remarks: Part of proof of part 14 in [Baer] p. 50 line 3.  Convert scalar base of dual to scalar base of vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmap14lem12.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmap14lem12.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem12.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem12.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem12.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmap14lem12.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hdmap14lem12.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem12.e $e |- .xb = ( .s ` C ) $.
hdmap14lem12.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmap14lem12.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmap14lem12.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
hdmap14lem15 $p |- ( ph -> E! g e. B A. x e. V ( S ` ( F .x. x ) ) = ( g .xb ( S ` x ) ) ) $.
$d .x. g x $.
$d .xb g x $.
$d B g $.
$d C g x $.
$d F g x $.
$d R g $.
$d S g x $.
$d U g x $.
$d V g x $.
$d g ph x $.
$d g x $.
